cause.description:
This lovely outdoor theatre is really suffering from the rain. The news really caught my attention last week. I really would like to at least contribute to this program which I eventually hope to work for in the future as a professional actor.
1. Save any theatre in need.
2. Support DFW proffessional theatre.
3. Help every actor.
cause.mission: save Shakespeare Dallas from severe debt
cause.name: Shakespeare Dallas
